Features.title: Close the Gap
Features.text: Our product bridges the gap between complex financial due diligence and retail investing by only displaying relevant metrics and data.

Features.title: Time Saving
Features.text: Reduce time spent analyzing 10-Ks and 10-Qs and quickly get a snapshot of a businessâ€™ underlying performance.

Features.title: Diverse Target Audience
Features.text: For beginner investors looking for a simple, yet powerful research tool or for seasoned professionals looking to make quick decisions on which securities to analyze further.

Features.title: Proprietary Algorithm
Features.text: Algorithmic analysis of all publicly traded securities that provides an investment recommendation score out of 100.
